column1: Smoque BBQ////   I got there around 5 PM on Sunday and waited approximately 90 minutes.  By the time we ordered
column2: I was drooling! But then my disappointment started.  I ordered the St. Louis Ribs (what they're known for) and they just ran out.  RAN OUT?  I nearly cried.  If this is your specialty
column3: how can you possibly run out?  Having to make a very quick
column4: on-the-spot decision (there were about twenty people behind me giving me the evil stare of death)
column5: I chose a pulled pork platter.  The pulled pork was standard.  Nothing great
column6: but standard.  The mac-and-cheese was standard
column7: and the fries were very good.
